projectDescription: Informative website about the dijkstra path finding algorithm. It will explain the algorithm step by step, as well as giving general information about it. Additionally there is a playful app implemented, that generates a story based on the algorithms path.
An eCommerce website, where you can configure and 'order' your dream guitar. It is not a real webshop and no money transactions will be made.

Developed as a study project, this is an attempt at a top down 3D Roguelite Game. You control a character crawling through an ancient pyramid, trying to find the exit, while encountering enemies on your way.

Developed as a challgenge in only 31 days. A 3D Jump and Run consisting of one playable level where you have to jump, dash and wall-run to the goal, while trying to collect all the feathers on your way.
